item.title: The Microsoft Zero Trust Assessment: Helping you operationalize the hardening of your Microsoft security products
item.description: Evolving Threats, Adaptive Defenses: The Security Practitioner’s New Reality Cyber threats are advancing faster than ever, and the arrival of highly accessible AI tools with a low proficiency barrier has made this challenge one that most organizations cannot keep up with. According to the latest Microsoft Digital Defense Report, 28% of breaches begin with phishing, and we also see a 4.5x increase in AI automated phishing campaigns with higher click through rates.
